title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body: Having previously seen this three or so days ago, I'm seeing this again which blocks me from logging in. Wondering if there is anything going on with servers at the moment? Server status seems fine, if so is it my ISP? I am with Telstra.

replies.body: I can't login as well. I could login yesterday but not today.
no we r all having problems
(Seems to be fixed- takes a while logging in)
